name: Givetroidvania
description:
Givetroidvania is a small Metroidvania. Some mining robots have been wanting some upgrades for a while, and you're here to help! Find the upgrades, give the robots the same upgrades, share in the power of them, and be prepared for the finale once all the robots are upgraded!

I hope you enjoy the game!

Caution: The following game contains an optional, unsettling end sequence. If you wish to play the game but do not wish to play the end sequence, press escape on the warning screen when asked. It will skip you straight to the credits.

P.S. If you encounter any major bugs in the game, I am so sorry. 48 hours can be a hard time frame to work with. o_0
